rules.name: Missing_Required_Fields_on_RT_Yes
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR (3 AND 6) OR (4 AND 5) OR (7 AND 8 AND 9)
rules.label: Yes

fields.name: DisplayMessage
fields.fieldText: You cannot cancel this Work Order as it has a Mod. Please go back and choose any other status.

fields.name: NotPossible
fields.fieldText: It is not possible to update the Service Appointment status.

fields.name: RT_Error_Text
fields.fieldText:
ERROR: Please make sure you enter the information below in the Repair Template before moving the appointment to Awaiting Signature:


1 - Document troubleshooting, cause, resolution


2 - Functioning as designed post repair. If answer is No: Explain if No


3 - Test performed per service manual: at least one option must be selected


4 - Occurrence Location: only required if you answered No to question 1 (Issue found during PM or BPI/PDI)

screens.name: Update_Service_Appointment_Status_from_In_Progress
screens.label: Update Service Appointment Status from In Progress

screens.name: Update_Service_Appointment_Status_Missing_Skills
screens.label: Update Service Appointment Status from In Progress

fields.name: Missing_skills
fields.fieldText: Note: you cannot move this Service Appointment to Awaiting Signature because you do not have the required certifications to complete this Work Order.

textTemplates.name: RejectNotification
